additional_info:
Wardrobe, Telephone, Window guards, pass-through, Heating system: central, gas, Hot water: gas 
 52 sq.m. flat in Vake, on the corner of I.Abashidze and Kavsadze streets. The building is located in the inside, very silent and nice garden. The flat is renovated with Euro standards, with central heating system, 12sq.m. Hall, isolated kitchen with garden view, big bedroom, 2 bathrooms. The flat is illuminated from 2 sides. The building has entrance as from Abashidze street, as well from Kavsadze street. 
Selling price: 60 000$
Tel. +995 591918115, +995 555025151

details.address: Tbilisi, Vake-Saburtalo,  Vake, Ir. Abashidze st.
